home.header: A Restful API providing character profiles from movies and TV shows
home.subtext: This project is in active development. You can provide feedback

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the character, contains firstname and lastname strings.
restrictions: firstname and lastname must be Strings containing only alphabetic characters
firstname and lastname have a minimum length of 1 and max lenth of 20 characters

properties.name: alias
properties.description: An alias of the character, could be an actual nickname or what I assume their social handle would be.
restrictions: permitted characters are alphanumeric characters and the underscore character (_)
minimum length of 1 and max lenth of 20 characters

properties.name: origin
properties.description: The work the character originates from
restrictions: permitted characters are alphanumeric characters and the underscore character (_)
minimum length of 1 and max lenth of 100 characters

properties.name: gender
restrictions: enum field which only accepts 'M' , 'F', or 'X' as values

properties.name: living
properties.description: Boolean indicating if the character is living or not.
restrictions: defaults to true if not provided

properties.name: dob
properties.description: Date of birth of the character in DD-MM-YYYY format.
restrictions: accepts only valid dates (dates on a calendar)
doesn't accept dates in the future

properties.name: tags
restrictions: each tag must be an alphabetic string with a max length of 15

properties.name: fact
restrictions: permitted characters are alphanumeric characters and these characters %!:;#-?()$.,&'"
minimum length of 1 and max lenth of 50 characters

properties.name: quote
restrictions: permitted characters are alphanumeric characters and these characters %!:;#-?()$.,&'"
minimum length of 1 and max lenth of 100 characters

routes.title: Get a random character
routes.description: Returns a single random character. Currently doesn't filter using query options.

routes.title: Get all characters
routes.description: Returns all characters matching the specified query options (if provided). Working on pagination.

notes: Including an unexpected query param will return a 422 error

options.name: limit
options.description: Limits number of results to specified number

options.name: firstname
options.description: Returns characters with the specified firstname

options.name: lastname
options.description: Returns characters with the specified lastname

options.name: gender
options.description: Returns characters with the specified gender

options.name: origin
options.description: Returns characters with the specified origin. Origin should be alphanumeric characters with _ to replace spaces. E.g 'The Office' would be 'the_office'.
